thread.section_title: World Nomads Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of World Nomads | worldnomads.com
thread.title: Jessica

author: Jessica
title: Jessica
text:
On a recent holiday to Thailand my IPhone suffered water damage on a boat trip. World Nomads were very prompt with my claim and covered the entire cost Quote: d by Apple to repair the damage.
It is the second time I have used World Nomads for travel insurance, however this was the first claim I have had to make, but I will definitely be using them again!
Thanks for your help
